summary: A craftable, standalone retexture for the Ebony armor set. Doesn\'t include retextured Ebony weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Solstheim Armor
================
From the cold plains of Solstheim, where Ebony mines are scattered everywhere and the Daedric Prince Hircine was defeated by the Nerevarine, comes an armor that is only worn by those worthy of it. Created at the mystical Skyforge, this armor grants great power to those who wear it. Who invented this armor? Noone knows..


Description
============
This mod adds a standalone, craftable, retextured Ebony armor to the game, wich is only to be crafted at the Skyforge. Stronger in defense and power than Daedric Armor makes it a good armor to be used at a higher level. The armor comes with realistic Crafting and Tempering recipes.


Origins of the mod
===================
The [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1432]Ebony-retexture[/url] was made by [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1467899]Rizaun[/url] and the sword is actually Glamdring, from the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5727]Lord of the Rings Weapon Pack[/url] made by 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1232514]Isilmeriel[/url]. Be sure to check them both out!


Installation
============
Just drag and drop all the files  from the .rar file into the Skyrim Data folder


Contact
=======
It is possible that the meshes contain the wrong filepath and won\'t use the textures. Let me know if that happens so I can help you with it :)


Credits
========
Credits go to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1467899]Rizaun[/url] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1232514]Isilmeriel[/url] for their mods. Thanks for your permission to use them, much appreciated :)
author: Proximitus
